main.name: Jeonghoon Lee
main.description: I am looking for an internship or a job opportunity. I am currently studying and working with Java, Java Spring Framework, Nodejs and React
main.bio: I have extensive experience in developing software applications over 10 years in South Korea, but I have left from a developer job since I came to Canada in 2013. To overcome my career gap and learn the latest technology, I am studying in Internet Programming and Development at the John Abbott College. I really want to get a new opportunity as a developer in Canada.

resume.skillmessage: I have experience of software developer over 10 years and good basic knowledge of software development. So I can easily learn new programming languages and frameworks.

education.degree: AEC in Internet Programming and Development
education.description: I am studying about web development and programming skills with latest technogy such as Java, C#, Javascript, PHP and database server.

work.title: Electromechanical Assembler
work.description: This was my first job in Canada. It was not a job that I expected in Canada. However it was valuable time for me. I learned about Canadian company culture, hardware knowledge and met good people.
I developed desktop applications based on Microsoft Windows Environment. I developed the automated camera module testing system controller with Visual C++, MFC and Matrox library for LG Electronics.

work.title: Senior Developer
work.description: I was a first software developer in this company. I helped a company setup development team and worked as senior developer. I led a team for developing the professional H.264 decoding system that was first developed product of company, and completed successfully.

work.title: Senior Researcher Engineer
work.description: Gunjarm was a venture company that was developing MPEG-2 encoder and decoder for broadcast service. I challenged new tech company with a dream and I was working and researching very hard to realize new technology into products. It wasn't easy, but very fun and good chance to learn a lot. I learned about MPEG-2, Visual C++, MFC, Windows API and Embedded system.

work.title: Junior Researcher Engineer
work.description: I was studied about collaboration and cowork using groupware system in university. This was a good chance for me to understand how to implement groupware system in real company. I was participated in developing the approval system and web mail service.
